citeinfo.origin: Roadway Inventory and Classification (RICS) Unit, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)
citeinfo.title: Mileposts

descript.abstract: This data contains mileposts on state owned highways.
descript.purpose: This GIS base layer can be used for planning purposes and as a reference layer on standard Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT) city and county map formats.

cntorgp.cntorg: Road Inventory and Classification Services (RICS) Unit, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT).

idinfo.datacred: Roadway Inventory and Classification (RICS) Unit, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)
idinfo.native: Windows XP Professional SP3, Geomedia Professional v6.0, ArcGIS v10.0

attracc.attraccr: HWYNAME, HWYNUMB, ST_HWY_SFX, RDWY_ID, MLGE_TYP, OVLP_CD, MP, MP_DESC, MP_DISP, LRS_KEY and LRM_KEY were obtained from the Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT) current TransInfo (TI) database. LAT, LONGTD, HRZ_COL_M, CRD_RF_DTM, Shape, GIS_PRC_DT and EFFECTV_DT were determined by the Geographic Information Services (GIS) Unit.

dataqual.complete: The file is complete at the time of posting.

horizpa.horizpar: File was based on the accuracy of the TransInfo (TI) database and the existing road network.

vertacc.vertaccr: No vertical positional accuracy has been determined

procstep.procdesc: The data for Mileposts was extracted from TransInfo using Bentley's Transportation Intelligence Gateway extract tool. It was output as a shapefile containing fields for HWYNAME, HWYNUMB, ST_HWY_SFX, RDWY_ID, MLGE_TYP, OVLP_CD, MP, MP_DESC, MP_DISP, LRS_KEY, LRM_KEY, LAT, LONGTD, HRZ_COL_M, CRD_RF_DTM, GIS_PRC_DT and EFFECTV_DT.

cntorgp.cntorg: Road Inventory and Classification Services (RICS) Unit, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT).

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

overview.eaover: mileposts contains HWYNAME, HWYNUMB, ST_HWY_SFX, RDWY_ID, MLGE_TYP, OVLP_CD, MP, MP_DESC, MP_DISP, LRS_KEY, LRM_KEY, LAT, LONGTD, HRZ_COL_M, CRD_RF_DTM, Shape, GIS_PRC_DT and EFFECTV_DT.

attr.attrdefs: TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attrdomv.udom: The official name of the state highway that is stored in the TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT).

attr.attrdefs: TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attr.attrdef: The main road or highway identifier is a three digit numeric code. Frontage roads and connections are identified by the three digits plus a two alpha-character suffix code.
attr.attrdefs: TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attr.attrdef: The roadway identifier is a one digit code used in conjunction with the highway number and milepoint to identify the alignment on which the milepoint exists.
attr.attrdefs: TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

edom.edomvds: TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)
TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)
TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)
TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attr.attrdefs: TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

edom.edomvds: TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attr.attrdef: Number indicating order in which instances of Z-Miles were added to the highway.
attr.attrdefs: TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attr.attrdef: A number that represents the distance in miles from the original beginning of the highway.
attr.attrdefs: TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attrvai.attrvae: TransInfo (TI) measurements are based on features located to +/- 0.02 mile.

attr.attrdefs: TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attr.attrdef: Milepoint display used for labeling purposes.
attr.attrdefs: TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attr.attrdef: Linear Referencing System (LRS) highway identifier. This is a representation of elements contained in the TransInfo (TI) database used to identify a highway, connection or frontage road. The first nine characters are the inventory route numbers and the last three characters are the sub-route numbers.
attr.attrdefs: TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attrdomv.udom: The twelve digit alphanumeric string is broken down into its components as: 1 - Place holder 0 (zero); 2-4 - Hwy Number 001 - 499; 5-6 - Hwy Suffix 00 (zero zero), AA-ZZ (alphabetic characters); 7 - Roadway Identifier (1-5); 8 - Mileage Type (Z, T, Y); 9 - Overlap Mileage Code (0-9); 10 - Jurisdiction Code (S); 11-12 - Two Place holders 00 (zero zero)

attr.attrdef: Linear Reference Method highway identifier. This is a representation of elements contained in the TransInfo (TI) database used to identify a highway, connection or frontage road. The first five characters are the inventory route numbers and the last three characters are the sub-route numbers.
attr.attrdefs: TransInfo (TI) database, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attrdomv.udom: The eight character alphanumeric string is broken down into its components as: 1-3:Hwy Number 001 to 499 4-5:Hwy Suffix 00 (zero zero) or AA-ZZ (alphabetic characters) 6:Roadway Identifier (I, D) 7:Mileage Type (Z, P) 8:Overlap Mileage Code (0-9)

attr.attrdef: Latitudinal Coordinate in decimal degrees format.
attr.attrdefs: Geographic Information Services (GIS) Unit, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attr.attrdef: Longitudinal Coordinate in decimal degrees format.
attr.attrdefs: Geographic Information Services (GIS) Unit, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)
Geographic Information Services (GIS) Unit, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

edom.edomvd: GIS Software derived based on highway and milepoint (dynamic segmentation).
edom.edomvds: Geographic Information Services (GIS) Unit, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT).

attr.attrdef: Coordinate Reference Datum: the name that describes the reference datum used in determining the easting (x) and northing (y) coordinates.
attr.attrdefs: Geographic Information Services (GIS) Unit, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attr.attrdef: The date or time period in which the data extract is relevant or current.
attr.attrdefs: Geographic Information Services (GIS) Unit, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attr.attrdef: The date that the data was processed.
attr.attrdefs: Geographic Information Services (GIS) Unit, Oregon Department of Transportation (ODOT)

attr.attrdef: The characteristic appearance or visible form of a geographic object as represented on a map. A GIS uses points, lines, and polygons to represent the shapes of geographic objects.

edom.edomvd: Point Features are a geometric element that represents a place or thing that has neither length nor area at a given scale and defined by a pair of x,y coordinates.

distinfo.distliab: This product is for informational purposes and may not have been prepared for legal, engineering or surveying purposes. Users of this information should review or consult the primary data and information sources to ascertain the usabaility of the information.
